mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS pkUserRoleId, r.pk_role_id AS roleId, r.role_name AS roleName, r.role_desc AS roleDesc FROM rm_role r INNER JOIN rm_user_role_rel p ON p.role_id = r.pk_role_id WHERE AND r.`status` = 1 AND p.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT '' AS pkUserRoleId, r.pk_role_id AS roleId, r.role_name AS roleName, r.role_desc AS roleDesc FROM rm_role r WHERE r.`status` = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rm_user_role_rel p WHERE AND p.role_id = r.pk_role_id AND p.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT r.pk_role_id AS roleId, r.role_name AS roleName FROM rm_role r WHERE r.`status` = 1
